name: Harvest Notifier
description: Automatic notification script for Slack based on Harvest data

HARVEST_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Harvest account ID for the team to monitor

EMAILS_WHITELIST.description: EMAILS_WHITELIST is a variable that lists emails separated by commas, which don't need to be notified in Slack. For example, administrators or managers.

MISSING_HOURS_THRESHOLD.description: MISSING_HOURS_THRESHOLD is a variable that indicates the minimum threshold of hours at which the employee will not be notified in Slack. For example, 2.5 or 4.

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: SLACK_CHANNEL is a variable that is used to determine which channel the employee will be notified in Slack

LOG_LEVEL.description: LOG_LEVEL controls the verbosity of logging. Options: ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG. Default: INFO
